We may store and/or access information on a device and process personal data, such as your IP address and browsing data, for personalised advertising and content, advertising and content measurement, audience research and services development. Additionally, we may utilize precise geolocation data and identification through device scanning.</p><p>Please note that your consent will be valid across all our subdomains. border-color: transparent; background-color: transparent;" data-cky-tag="readmore-button">Cookie Policy</a></p></div><div class="cky-notice-btn-wrapper" data-cky-tag="notice-buttons"><button class="cky-btn cky-btn-customize" aria-label="Customise" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-controls="ckyPreferenceCenter" data-cky-tag="settings-button" style="color: #1863DC; border-color: #1863DC; background-color: #FFFFFF;">Customise</button> <button class="cky-btn cky-btn-reject" aria-label="Essential Only" data-cky-tag="reject-button" style="color: #1863DC; border-color: #1863DC; background-color: #FFFFFF;">Essential Only</button> <button class="cky-btn cky-btn-accept" aria-label="Accept All" data-cky-tag="accept-button" style="color: #FFFFFF; border-color: #2F512A; background-color: #58964E;">Accept All</button></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cky-modal" tabindex="-1"><div class="cky-preference-center" data-cky-tag="detail" aria-label="Customise Consent Preferences" aria-modal="true" id="ckyPreferenceCenter" role="dialog" style="color: #212121; border-color: #F4F4F4; background-color: #FFFFFF;"><div class="cky-preference-header"><span class="cky-preference-title" aria-level="2" data-cky-tag="detail-title" role="heading" style="color: #212121;">Customise Consent Preferences</span> <button aria-label="Close" class="cky-btn-close" data-cky-tag="detail-close"><img alt="cky-close-icon" src="https://cdn-cookieyes.com/assets/images/close.svg"></button></div><div class="cky-iab-detail-wrapper" data-cky-tag="detail-iab-option"><div class="cky-iab-preference-des" data-cky-tag="detail-iab-description" style="color: #212121;"><p>Customise your consent preferences for Cookie Categories and advertising tracking preferences for Purposes & Features and Vendors below. You can give granular consent for each <button class="cky-iab-dec-btn" id="ckyIABPreferenceButton" aria-label="Third Party Vendor">Third Party Vendor</button>. class="cky-accordion-iab-item"> <div class="cky-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-accordion-header-wrapper"> <div class="cky-accordion-header"> <button id="ckyIABPNFSection1Body">  <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1Body" aria-label="Store and/or access information on a device">Store and/or access information on a device</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Store and/or access information on a device Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item1Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Cookies, device or similar online identifiers (e.g. login-based identifiers, randomly assigned identifiers, network based identifiers) together with other information (e.g. browser type and information, language, screen size, supported technologies etc.) can be stored or read on your device to recognise it each time it connects to an app or to a website, for one or several of the purposes presented here.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>Most purposes explained in this notice rely on the storage or accessing of information from your device when you use an app or visit a website. For example, a vendor or publisher might need to store a cookie on your device during your first visit on a website, to be able to recognise your device during your next visits (by accessing this cookie each time).</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 175</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2Body" aria-label="Use limited data to select advertising">Use limited data to select advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Use limited data to select advertising Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use limited data to select advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item2Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Advertising presented to you on this service can be based on limited data, such as the website or app you are using, your non-precise location, your device type or which content you are (or have been) interacting with (for example, to limit the number of times an ad is presented to you).</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>A car manufacturer wants to promote its electric vehicles to environmentally conscious users living in the city after office hours. The advertising is presented on a page with related content (such as an article on climate change actions) after 6:30 p.m. to users whose non-precise location suggests that they are in an urban zone.</li><li>A large producer of watercolour paints wants to carry out an online advertising campaign for its latest watercolour range, diversifying its audience to reach as many amateur and professional artists as possible and avoiding showing the ad next to mismatched content (for instance, articles about how to paint your house). The number of times that the ad has been presented to you is detected and limited, to avoid presenting it too often.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 161</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3Body" aria-label="Create profiles for personalised advertising">Create profiles for personalised advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Create profiles for personalised advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item3Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information about your activity on this service (such as forms you submit, content you look at) can be stored and combined with other information about you (for example, information from your previous activity on this service and other websites or apps) or similar users. This is then used to build or improve a profile about you (that might include possible interests and personal aspects). Your profile can be used (also later) to present advertising that appears more relevant based on your possible interests by this and other entities.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>If you read several articles about the best bike accessories to buy, this information could be used to create a profile about your interest in bike accessories. Such a profile may be used or improved later on, on the same or a different website or app to present you with advertising for a particular bike accessory brand. If you also look at a configurator for a vehicle on a luxury car manufacturer website, this information could be combined with your interest in bikes to refine your profile and make an assumption that you are interested in luxury cycling gear.</li><li>An apparel company wishes to promote its new line of high-end baby clothes. It gets in touch with an agency that has a network of clients with high income customers (such as high-end supermarkets) and asks the agency to create profiles of young parents or couples who can be assumed to be wealthy and to have a new child, so that these can later be used to present advertising within partner apps based on those profiles.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 149</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4Body" aria-label="Use profiles to select personalised advertising">Use profiles to select personalised advertising</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use profiles to select personalised advertising Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item4Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Advertising presented to you on this service can be based on your advertising profiles, which can reflect your activity on this service or other websites or apps (like the forms you submit, content you look at), possible interests and personal aspects.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>An online retailer wants to advertise a limited sale on running shoes. It wants to target advertising to users who previously looked at running shoes on its mobile app. Tracking technologies might be used to recognise that you have previously used the mobile app to consult running shoes, in order to present you with the corresponding advertisement on the app.</li><li>A profile created for personalised advertising in relation to a person having searched for bike accessories on a website can be used to present the relevant advertisement for bike accessories on a mobile app of another organisation.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 148</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5Body" aria-label="Create profiles to personalise content">Create profiles to personalise content</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Create profiles to personalise content Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item5Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information about your activity on this service (for instance, forms you submit, non-advertising content you look at) can be stored and combined with other information about you (such as your previous activity on this service or other websites or apps) or similar users. This is then used to build or improve a profile about you (which might for example include possible interests and personal aspects). Your profile can be used (also later) to present content that appears more relevant based on your possible interests, such as by adapting the order in which content is shown to you, so that it is even easier for you to find content that matches your interests.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You read several articles on how to build a treehouse on a social media platform. This information might be added to a profile to mark your interest in content related to outdoors as well as do-it-yourself guides (with the objective of allowing the personalisation of content, so that for example you are presented with more blog posts and articles on treehouses and wood cabins in the future).</li><li>You have viewed three videos on space exploration across different TV apps. An unrelated news platform with which you have had no contact builds a profile based on that viewing behaviour, marking space exploration as a topic of possible interest for other videos.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 47</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6Body" aria-label="Use profiles to select personalised content">Use profiles to select personalised content</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper">  <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Use profiles to select personalised content Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item6Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Content presented to you on this service can be based on your content personalisation profiles, which can reflect your activity on this or other services (for instance, the forms you submit, content you look at), possible interests and personal aspects. This can for example be used to adapt the order in which content is shown to you, so that it is even easier for you to find (non-advertising) content that matches your interests.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You read articles on vegetarian food on a social media platform and then use the cooking app of an unrelated company. The profile built about you on the social media platform will be used to present you vegetarian recipes on the welcome screen of the cooking app.</li><li>You have viewed three videos about rowing across different websites. An unrelated video sharing platform will recommend five other videos on rowing that may be of interest to you when you use your TV app, based on a profile built about you when you visited those different websites to watch online videos.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent: 39</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7Body" aria-label="Measure advertising performance">Measure advertising performance</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Measure advertising performance Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Measure advertising performance Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item7Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information regarding which advertising is presented to you and how you interact with it can be used to determine how well an advert has worked for you or other users and whether the goals of the advertising were reached. For instance, whether you saw an ad, whether you clicked on it, whether it led you to buy a product or visit a website, etc. This is very helpful to understand the relevance of advertising campaigns.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You have clicked on an advertisement about a black Friday discount by an online shop on the website of a publisher and purchased a product. Your click will be linked to this purchase. Your interaction and that of other users will be measured to know how many clicks on the ad led to a purchase.</li><li>You are one of very few to have clicked on an advertisement about an international appreciation day discount by an online gift shop within the app of a publisher. The publisher wants to have reports to understand how often a specific ad placement within the app, and notably the international appreciation day ad, has been viewed or clicked by you and other users, in order to help the publisher and its partners (such as agencies) optimise ad placements.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 172</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8Body" aria-label="Measure content performance">Measure content performance</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Measure content performance Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(88, 150, 78);"> </div></div> <div class="cky-consent-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Consent</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8ToggleConsent" aria-label="Enable Measure content performance Consent" autocomplete="off" style="background-color: rgb(208, 213, 210);"> </div></div> </div></div></div><div class="cky-child-accordion-body" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item8Body"> <div class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details"> <p class="cky-iab-ad-settings-details-des">Information regarding which content is presented to you and how you interact with it can be used to determine whether the (non-advertising) content e.g. reached its intended audience and matched your interests. For instance, whether you read an article, watch a video, listen to a podcast or look at a product description, how long you spent on this service and the web pages you visit etc. This is very helpful to understand the relevance of (non-advertising) content that is shown to you.</p><div class="cky-iab-illustrations"> <p class="cky-iab-illustrations-title">Illustrations</p><ul class="cky-iab-illustrations-des"><li>You have read a blog post about hiking on a mobile app of a publisher and followed a link to a recommended and related post. Your interactions will be recorded as showing that the initial hiking post was useful to you and that it was successful in interesting you in the related post. This will be measured to know whether to produce more posts on hiking in the future and where to place them on the home screen of the mobile app.</li><li>You were presented a video on fashion trends, but you and several other users stopped watching after 30 seconds. This information is then used to evaluate the right length of future videos on fashion trends.</li></ul> </div> <p class="cky-iab-vendors-count-wrapper">Number of Vendors seeking consent or relying on legitimate interest: 68</p> </div></div></div> <div class="cky-child-accordion" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-item"> <div class="cky-child-accordion-chevron"> <i class="cky-chevron-right"></i> </div><div class="cky-child-accordion-header-wrapper"> <button class="cky-child-accordion-btn" aria-expanded="false" aria-controls="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9Body" aria-label="Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources">Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources</button> <div class="cky-switch-wrapper"> <div class="cky-legitimate-switch-wrapper cky-switch-separator"> <div class="cky-switch-label">Legitimate Interest</div><div class="cky-switch-sm"> <input type="checkbox" id="ckyIABPNFSection1Item9ToggleLegitimate" aria-label="Disable Understand audiences through statistics or combinations of data from different sources Legitimate Interest" autocomplete="off"                                     <p>Unplaced in all six starts. Beaten 20l behind Who's On First at 50-1 when last of 7 on her latest outing at Chelmsford City over 1m earlier this month. Runs from 1lb out of handicap.</p>

                                <div id="tooltip-timeform-verdict-content-3770713">
                                    <p>Another poor effort when last of seven at Chelmsford last time. No worthwhile form and a wide draw; yet to show any sign of ability.</p>

        <div class="tabs__content-wrapper js-tabs__content-wrapper is-busy">
                <div id="verdict-atr-1572877" class="tabs__content">
                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Electrocution has stepped forward on his last couple of starts and got off the mark at Wolverhampton at the beginning of the month. Despite showing an improved level of form, a 4lb rise does ask more of Chelsea Banham's gelding and HOVE RANGER might be the one to take advantage. Runner-up on his handicap bow at Lingfield, he is expected to have more to offer from the same rating. Others to consider are Giles Glory and Private Project.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Hove-Ranger/FR/3827455?raceid=1572877" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Hove-Ranger/FR/3827455?raceid=1572877" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Hove Ranger</a>
(5)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Electrocution/GB/3825852?raceid=1572877" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Electrocution/GB/3825852?raceid=1572877" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Electrocution</a>
(1)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572877" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>HOVE RANGER wasn't without promise in three qualifying runs and duly stepped up nicely to finish a good second on his handicap debut over 8f at Lingfield. The drop in trip raises a question, but he's open to further improvement and earns the vote. Electrocution was off the mark at Wolverhampton last time and a small rise leaves him on a competitive mark still. He can again go well and looks the danger although Giles Glory is certainly capable still in the reapplied visor and not easily dismissed.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <h2 class="h6">1-2-3 Selections</h2>

            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>MARLBOROUGH PLACE sets a decent standard judged on his two starts in Ireland and it wouldn't be a huge surprise if he proved capable of defying a 7lb penalty following his Limerick success back in July. Holly Mist showed signs of inexperience when second at Lingfield earlier in the month and may well have benefited from that outing, while Ablon completes the shortlist.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Marlborough-Place/IRE/3777592?raceid=1572878" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Marlborough-Place/IRE/3777592?raceid=1572878" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Marlborough Place</a>
(1)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Holly-Mist/IRE/3771472?raceid=1572878" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Holly-Mist/IRE/3771472?raceid=1572878" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Holly Mist</a>
(5)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572878" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Marlborough Place is likely capable of better for his new yard, having signed off his time in Ireland with a win at Limerick but he's conceding plenty of weight to the selection HOLLY MIST, who is favoured on this occasion. She improved from her debut despite plenty not going right at Lingfield last time and holds strong claims here assuming things go smoother. Ablon is respected also as she too is coming off an improved effort when runner-up over 8f here. The drop to 7f looks fine and she may be the main danger to the selection.</p>
            </div>

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>POPMASTER retains plenty of enthusiasm, with the eight-year-old returning to the winner's enclosure here over a mile three weeks ago when having Nikovo back in third. Despite a 3lb swing in the weights, Ed Walker's gelding has every chance of confirming the form and backing that success up. Kingdom Come wasn't disgraced over C&D behind a subsequent Listed winner and is of significant interest off a 2lb lower mark.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Popmaster/IRE/3178817?raceid=1572879" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Popmaster/IRE/3178817?raceid=1572879" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Popmaster</a>
(1)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Kingdom-Come/IRE/3328818?raceid=1572879" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Kingdom-Come/IRE/3328818?raceid=1572879" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Kingdom Come</a>
(3)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572879" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>He might be making his AW debut but GOD OF WAR has plenty of potential given he kept good company in turf handicaps at three. He was tried at Listed level as a 2yo also and it's easy to see him getting back into a mark in 100s this season. Nikovo has been in good form recently, albeit without winning, and he's a solid alternative with a good run seeming assured, with similar comments applying to Popmaster, who likes it here and still looks competitively weighted up 3lb and down in trip.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Holy Fire showed significant improvement to get her head back in front over 7f here last month and commands respect, but it may pay to side with TOP OF THE CLASS. Mark Loughnane's mare filled the runner-up berth over an extended mile at Wolverhampton on her most recent start and, with all three of her career victories coming over C&D, she looks the one to be on. I Am Me isn't ruled out either.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Top-Of-The-Class/GB/3395214?raceid=1572880" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Top-Of-The-Class/GB/3395214?raceid=1572880" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Top Of The Class</a>
(5)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Holy-Fire/GB/3414408?raceid=1572880" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Holy-Fire/GB/3414408?raceid=1572880" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Holy Fire</a>
(7)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572880" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>HOLY FIRE scored with a bit in hand here last time, when it was reported she'd benefitted from a change in training routine, and 4lb rise looks most manageable given it wasn't that long ago she was competing off marks in the 80s. Luminous Warrior failed to run to form last time but with excuses and he's considered on his earlier C&D win with his mark still looking fair. I Am Me is third choice. He's proving consistent, likes this C&D and remains on a fair mark.</p>
            </div>

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Group 3 winner Tadej sets the standard with an official rating of 105 and holds an obvious chance, while Utmost Good Faith seeks a four-timer and is one to keep an eye on. However, HIDDEN FORCE made a deep impression when scoring on his sole juvenile start over 7f here in December and has plenty of scope for improvement. The extra furlong will suit this well-bred son of Frankel and he looks the one to side with.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Hidden-Force/GB/3840972?raceid=1572881" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Hidden-Force/GB/3840972?raceid=1572881" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Hidden Force</a>
(1)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Tadej/GB/3763616?raceid=1572881" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Tadej/GB/3763616?raceid=1572881" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Tadej</a>
(2)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572881" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>Tadej sets the form standard being a Group 3 winner at two but he can races keenly and didn't get home over an extended 6f when last seen. It's a worry, therefore, that he's now asked to go 8f. He also needs to show that he's trained on. Let's instead go with Godolphin's HIDDEN FORCE, who was impressive over 7f here on debut and should prove well suited by the step up to 8f - he's a middle-distance bred son of Frankel. His yard has also won four of the last five runnings of this race, including with subsequent 2,000 Guineas winner Notable Speech in 2024. Venetian Prince met defeat at short odds at Southwell on his return but is better than that could be the one to follow the selection home.</p>
            </div>

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>All of these have claims, but none more so than HELGA. Andrew Balding's filly took a big step forward when winning over C&D on just her second start and that effort suggests that an opening mark of 77 should be workable. Only In Manila also won over this track and trip on his latest outing and he has to be noted on his handicap bow. Parisian Scholar is the pick of the remainder.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Helga/GB/3849117?raceid=1572882" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Helga/GB/3849117?raceid=1572882" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Helga</a>
(2)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Only-In-Manila/GB/3815449?raceid=1572882" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Only-In-Manila/GB/3815449?raceid=1572882" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Only In Manila</a>
(4)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572882" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>All five of these can be given a chance and it's a tricky race to call. Parisian Scholar has already achieved a fair bit despite having yet to race beyond 8f - he's bred to relish middle-distances. He's also been gelded, so there's surely more to come, but the same can be said of MOMENT OF LIGHT. He showed promise in three qualifying runs last year and has been gelded since his last run, while he also gets a first-time tongue-tie. He's surely better than an opening mark of 72. Toastmaster shaped as though a trip like this would suit last time and is considered also.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <h2 class="h6">1-2-3 Selections</h2>

                <ol class="ol ol--inline push--xx-small">

                    <section class="panel">


            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>The recent Lingfield winners Combustion and Invincible Speed both have to be noted, but their new marks demand more from them. With that in mind, preference is for TYGER BAY, who is a five-time C&D winner and he was only beaten a neck into second when last seen at Chelmsford in December. Em Four is another who arrives with valid claims. </p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <p>
                        <b>Top Tip:</b>
        <a href="/form/horse/Tyger-Bay/GB/3135853?raceid=1572883" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Tyger-Bay/GB/3135853?raceid=1572883" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Tyger Bay</a>
(1)                        <br>

                        <b>Watch out for:</b> 
        <a href="/form/horse/Combustion/GB/3584138?raceid=1572883" data-url="/form-popup/horse/Combustion/GB/3584138?raceid=1572883" data-cookie="popupForm" data-options="{"theme": "white"}" class="text-transform--uppercase tooltip tooltipstered a--plain js-popup-trigger">Combustion</a>
(2)                </p>
            </div>


                    </section>
                </div>

                <div id="verdict-tf-1572883" class="tabs__content is-hidden">
                    <section class="panel">



            <div class="panel-content border--no-border-top border--no-border-bottom">
                <p>COMBUSTION has won six of his last eight starts and is particularly well suited by this 6f trip, being asked a fair question from off the pace at Lingfield last time and coming through with flying colours. A 7lb rise asks more but he's capable of better still. Em Four is consistent and finished runner-up for this rider over C&D three starts back. He looks the danger to the selection although Invincible Speed is in form himself and comes here off a win at Lingfield last time. He may still have a bigger effort in him.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="panel-footer p--x-small">
                <h2 class="h6">1-2-3 Selections</h2>
